text: Michael Jones (24 March 1947 â€“ 9 August 2022) was an English professional footballer and manager. Jones started his career as a central defender for Derby County. He later began playing with Notts County in 1969. He also played for Peterborough United. Jones died on 9 August 2022 at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Tyne and Wear Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:English football managers
